name: Planetary Evo
description:
Game was made for Weekend Crazy Jam 1. In the future of this game, you will be able to create your own civilization and manage how it will evolve. Now it looks more like prototype, I should have made this project a bit smaller because I didn't manage to add much gameplay to it :) Though you can try it out, there is something, lol :)

Credits are all in the main menu.
